images.copyright: An indigo bunting perched on a branch, Texas (© Jeff R Clow/Getty Images)
images.title: Tweeting 'bon voyage'
images.caption: World Migratory Bird Day
images.desc: On World Migratory Bird Day, we introduce the indigo bunting, a tiny bird with plumage like the twilight sky. They traverse thousands of miles using the stars to navigate as they fly between North America, and their wintering grounds in Central America and northern South America.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
